languages.text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a critical hit against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking psychic powers) will cost 0 AP and have no cooldown.
Every time the psyker kills or scores a critical hit against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking psychic powers) will cost 0 AP and have no cooldown.

Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Каждый раз, когда псайкер убивает или совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} 8 существам в одном бою, его следующая атака (включая атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}) будет стоить 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и не будет входить в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раз, когда псайкер убивает или совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} 8 существам в одном бою, его следующая атака (включая атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}) будет стоить 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и не будет входить в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

languages.text: 每当灵能者在一场战斗内对8名生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}或造成击杀时，灵能者的下次攻击（包括{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}在内）不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且不会计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击次数。
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者在一场战斗对8名生物造成暴击或击杀时，灵能者的下次攻击（包括灵能能力在内）不消耗任何行动点数，且不会进入冷却时间。

languages.text: 異能者が1度の戦闘で8体の生物に対して、倒すか{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を当てるたび、異能者の次の攻撃（{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}攻撃も対象）の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}は0になり、クールダウンもなくなる。また、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の攻撃上限にカウントされない。
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 異能者が1度の戦闘で8体の生物に対して、倒すか{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を当てるたび、異能者の次の攻撃（{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}攻撃も対象）の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}は0になり、クールダウンもなくなる。また、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の攻撃上限にカウントされない。

languages.text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Psioniker 8 Kreaturen in einem Kampf tötet oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} gegen sie erzielt, kostet der nächste Angriff des Psionikers (einschließlich angreifender {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischer Kräfte{/g}) 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn der Psioniker 8 Kreaturen in einem Kampf tötet oder einen kritischen Treffer gegen sie erzielt, kostet der nächste Angriff des Psionikers (einschließlich angreifender psionischer Kräfte) 0 AP und hat keine Abklingzeit.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le psyker élimine ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à 8 créatures dans un même combat, son attaque suivante (y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} offensifs) ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et ne compte pas dans le nombre maximum d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le psyker élimine ou inflige un coup critique à 8 créatures dans un même combat, son attaque suivante (y compris les pouvoirs psychiques offensifs) ne coûte aucun PA et n'a aucun délai de récupération.

languages.text: Cada vez que el psíquico mata o inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} a 8 criaturas en un combate, el siguiente ataque del psíquico (incluyendo {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}) cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el psíquico mata o inflige un impacto crítico a 8 criaturas en un combate, el siguiente ataque del psíquico (incluyendo poderes psíquicos) cuesta 0 PA y no tiene tiempo de recuperación.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, bir çatışmada 8 yaratık öldürdüğünde veya onlara {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yaptığında bir sonraki saldırısı (saldırı amaçlı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} de dâhil), 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz.
languages.original_text: Every time the psyker kills or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against 8 creatures in one combat, the psyker's next attack (including attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}) will cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and will not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
